      • getSiteTemplates

        public Collection<Site> getSiteTemplates​(@Nonnull
                                         com.composum.sling.core.BeanContext context,
                                         String tenant)
        Description copied from interface: SiteManager
        Determines all usable site templates in the context of a specific tenant. This implementation uses the resolvers search path to find all site resources in a tenants application context. Overlayed site resources are not in the result.
        Specified by:
        getSiteTemplates in interface SiteManager
        Parameters:
        context - the current request context
        tenant - the tenants name (key); maybe >null< if tenants are not known
        Returns:
        the collection of all site templates found (not >null<)
